description: Data model describing input variables for the simulation

run.description: Name of the root files created by MOLTEMPLATE and LAMMPS.

cutoff.description: Cut-off radius for interactions in real space.

cl.description: Correlation length, used to sample the thermodynamic output.

s.description: Sample interval, used to sample the thermodynamic output.

prod.description: Number of steps to be computed in the current MD simulation.

force_field1.description: Filename of the force field for the 1st molecule type in the simulation.

aa_atb.description: LT file containing the macros for the GROMOS-ATB force field.

aa_tasks.description: LT file containing the macros defining various simulation styles and thermodynamic outputs.

TYPE1.description: Name of the 1st molecule type in the simulation, as defined in the corresponding LT file.
